name: Eat Holdings Ltd.
description: Developer of a restaurant reservation platform designed to connect restaurants and diners. The company's platform helps restaurant operators manage table reservations with comprehensive floor planning features and customer history and provides a tool to publish targeted promotions and discounts, as well as helps users discover restaurants and book reservations, enabling customers to make reservations easily through a mobile application.
one_liner: Developer of a restaurant reservation platform designed to connect restaurants and diners. The company's platform helps restaurant operators manage table reservations with comprehensive floor planning features and customer history and provides a tool to publish targeted promotions and discounts, as well as helps users discover restaurants and book reservations, enabling customers to make reservations easily through a mobile application.
